channel.title: How do I make a lifebar?
channel.description: In real RuneScape, when you attack someone or something, they get a Green/Red bar over their head. How do I make that in MoparScape private server without a client? I did see a server having this (without a client)

item.title: How do I make a lifebar?

item.description:
@enzroc wrote:

there is some tutorials i think on this subject if i find i will post
